pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.2: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā adhovāte aṭṭhāsi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.5: “ādiyantu kho bhikkhuniyo udakasuddhikan”ti, mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.6: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.1.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.2: “bhagavatā udakasuddhikā anuññātā”ti atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyantī muttakaraṇe vaṇaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.3: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ āroceti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.4: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.6: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.9: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:1.2.12: “Udakasuddhikaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā ādiyamānāya dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbaṃ. Taṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:2.1.8: samphassaṃ sādiyantī antamaso kesaggamattampi atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
